name: ScalaTest+ Play 6.0.0-M1
body:
## Changes - #376 Latest scala sbt versions by @mkurz - #375 fix warnings by @xuwei-k - #373 ScalaTest 3.2, drop PhantomJS/Java 8/Scala 2.12, add MS Edge, add GithHub actions by @cheeseng - #371 selenium-java 4.4.0 (was 4.1.4) by @scala-steward - #370 htmlunit-driver 2.64.0 (was 2.62.0) by @scala-steward - #372 🔄 Synced file(s) with playframework/.github by @ihostage - #365 sbt 1.7 by @mkurz - #362 selenium-java 4.1.4 (was 4.1.3) by @scala-steward - #359 htmlunit-cssparser 1.12.0 (was 1.11.0) by @scala-steward - #363 play-ahc-ws, play-akka-http-server, ... 2.8.16 (was 2.8.15) by @scala-steward - #364 htmlunit-driver 2.62.0 (was 2.60.0) by @scala-steward - #278 Add wildcard import for Helpers in ScalaFunctionalTestSpec by @Aghmat - #297 Make sure the scalatestplus version scheme is honored by @raboof - #330 htmlunit-cssparser 1.11.0 (was 1.6.0) by @scala-steward - #358 fix: base class definition URL by @ptitFicus - #351 selenium-4-1 3.2.10.0 (was 3.1.4.0) by @scala-steward - #356 selenium-java 4.1.3 (was 3.141.59) by @scala-steward - #357 Nicer sbt-dynver config by @mkurz - #354 sbt-mima-plugin 1.1.0 (was 1.0.1) by @scala-steward - #355 htmlunit-driver 2.60.0 (was 2.59.0) by @scala-steward - #352 Play 2.8.15 by @mkurz - #349 mockito-3-4, selenium-3-141 3.2.10.0 (was 3.1.4.0) by @scala-steward - #350 htmlunit-driver 2.59.0 (was 2.58.0) by @scala-steward - #288 scalatest 3.1.4 (was 3.1.2) by @scala-steward - #327 phantomjsdriver 1.5.0 (was 1.4.4) by @scala-steward - #347 Upgrade to sbt 1.6.2 by @wsargent - #344 sbt-mima-plugin 1.0.1 (was 0.9.2) by @scala-steward - #345 htmlunit-driver 2.58.0 (was 2.43.1) by @scala-steward - #342 Add release drafter with configs from .github repo by @mkurz - #341 Remove unused Probot settings file by @mkurz - #339 Rename master branch to main by @mkurz - #338 Use official release drafter action by @mkurz - #304 mockito-3-2 3.1.2.0 (was 3.1.1.0) by @scala-steward - #314 sbt-mima-plugin 0.9.2 (was 0.8.1) by @scala-steward - #336 sbt-scalafmt 2.4.6 (was 2.4.0) by @scala-steward - #335 play-ahc-ws, play-akka-http-server, ... 2.8.13 (was 2.8.8) by @scala-steward - #334 interplay 3.0.5 (was 3.0.0) by @scala-steward - #319 play-akka-http-server, ... 2.8.8 (was 2.8.3) by @scala-steward - #318 use slash syntax instead of deprecated `in` by @xuwei-k - #285 htmlunit-driver 2.43.1 (was 2.39.0) by @scala-steward - #290 sbt-mima-plugin 0.8.1 (was 0.7.0) by @scala-steward - #291 play-ahc-ws, play-akka-http-server, ... 2.8.3 (was 2.8.2) by @scala-steward - #292 htmlunit-cssparser 1.6.0 (was 1.5.0) by @scala-steward - #293 sbt 1.4.1 (was 1.3.13) by @scala-steward - #296 Add scalatest plus mockito as a dependency. by @toshetah - #277 make Scala Steward less aggressive; enable release drafter by @ennru - #276 Update sbt-dynver to 4.1.1 by @scala-steward - #275 Mergify: merge-when-green by @octonato - #258 Document release process by @raboof - #273 Update sbt to 1.3.13 by @scala-steward - #266 Update sbt to 1.3.12 by @scala-steward - #264 Update scalafmt-core to 2.5.3 by @scala-steward - #263 Update play-ahc-ws, play-akka-http-server, ... to 2.8.2 by @scala-steward - #262 Update sbt-scalafmt to 2.4.0 by @scala-steward - #261 Update selenium-3-141 to 3.1.2.0 by @scala-steward - #259 Update scalafmt-core to 2.5.2 by @scala-steward - #260 Update scalatest to 3.1.2 by @scala-steward ## :heart: Thanks to our premium sponsors!
If you find this OSS project useful for work, please consider asking your company to support it by becoming a sponsor. You can also individually sponsor the project by becoming a backer.
## :bow: Thanks to our contributors Finally, thanks to the community for their help with detailed bug reports, discussions about new features and pull request reviews. This project is only possible due to the help we had from amazing contributors. Special thanks to all code contributors who helped with this particular release (they are listed below)!
